comment.author: 91448101@N00
comment._content: I love taking pics of doorways. Sometimes I just go to the French Quarter and do just that. LD.

comment.author: 33888757@N05
comment._content: They just don't build them like they used to - it's so beautiful and intricate!  Salt print from waxed paper negative - how did that work? Sounds like it was very delicate to handle. Thank you, Art Fund 1999!

comment.author: 24998710@N07
comment._content: I was there 2 years back, it is an incredible ornate entrance with amazing light inside.

comment.author: 59927723@N00
comment._content: Thanks for posting. It is indeed an amazing building - with Reims and Chartres my favorite French gothic cathedral. www.flickr.com/photos/59927723@N00/sets/72157619731068108/
